content.text:
I'll help you warm up by exploring the codebase structure. Let me start by getting an overview of the repository.

<tools>
<invoke name="bash">
<parameter name="command">find /Users/juliani/repos/svelte5/wiki -type f -name "*.svelte" -o -name "*.ts" -o -name "*.js" -o -name "*.json" | head -20</parameter>
</invoke>
</tools>

<tools>
<invoke name="read">
<parameter name="file_path">/Users/juliani/repos/svelte5/wiki/package.json</parameter>
</invoke>
</tools>

<tools>
<invoke name="bash">
<parameter name="command">ls -la /Users/juliani/repos/svelte5/wiki</parameter>
</invoke>
</tools>

Let me also check the recent git status and see what files have been modified:

<tools>
<invoke name="read">
<parameter name="file_path">/Users/juliani/repos/svelte5/wiki/docs/notes.md</parameter>
</invoke>
</tools>

Let me explore the src directory structure to understand the project layout:

<tools>
<invoke name="bash">
<parameter name="command">find /Users/juliani/repos/svelte5/wiki/src -type f -name "*.svelte" | head -10</parameter>
</invoke>
</tools>

<tools>
<invoke name="bash">
<parameter name="command">find /Users/juliani/repos/svelte5/wiki/src -type d | head -10</parameter>
</invoke>
</tools>
